long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Video Record My Life is designed to help you record memories just like you would do in a journal but in video and picture format. This extension is perfect for the older generation with big text and easily clickable icons to help record their memories forever.
